title: How Not to Die
author: Michael Greger, M.D.
summary: Dr. Greger's examination of evidence-based nutrition and lifestyle practices to prevent and reverse common diseases. 'How Not to Die' provides practical insights into adopting a plant-based diet and making lifestyle choices for optimal health.

title: The Blue Zones: Lessons for Living Longer From the People Who've Lived the Longest
author: Dan Buettner
summary: Buettner's exploration of the habits and lifestyles of the world's longest-lived people. 'The Blue Zones' offers lessons on longevity, well-being, and happiness, based on the practices of communities with high life expectancy.

title: The Whole-Body Microbiome: How to Harness Microbes—Inside and Out—for Lifelong Health
author: B. Brett Finlay and Jessica M. Finlay
summary: The Finlays' guide to understanding and harnessing the power of the microbiome for overall health. 'The Whole-Body Microbiome' explores the role of microbes in various bodily functions and provides insights into maintaining a healthy microbiome.
